title: Effect of "cancellation" or "rescission" on claims
context: ยง490:2-720 Effect of &ldquo;cancellation&rdquo; or &ldquo;rescission&rdquo; on claims for antecedent breach. Unless the contrary intention clearly appears, expressions of &ldquo;cancellation&rdquo; or &ldquo;rescission&rdquo; of the contract or the like shall not be construed as a renunciation or discharge of any claim in damages for an antecedent breach. [L 1965, c 208, ยง2-720; HRS ยง490:2-720]
